name: Block Tower Mayhem
description:
Simple Arcade-style VR game in which you must avoid blocks while falling from above. Game ends if you get hit by a falling block or if you try to hide in an out of bounds area.

This game was created for Ludum Dare 37 with the theme: "One Room." Assets included were part of unity standard assets or purchased by Kenney Assets.

NOTE: This game is designed for the HTC Vive specifically and has not been tested on other VR devices.
